kpi_info.title: Discarded AAL5 CPCS-PDUs
kpi_info.use: Discarded AAL5 CPCS-PDUs (STR-NM-M4NE-REQ-02.00).The amount of discarded Common Part Convergence Sublayer Protocol Data Units. This counter indicates the discarding of AAL5 received cells. Cells are discarded due to an overflow of the receiving buffer, an overflow of the receiving FIFO, an overflow of the status queue in internal communication or the received packet being bigger than the biggest packet allowed.
